SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (COVID-19 â€” Prior Reference Periods for Wage Subsidy, Rent Subsidy and Hiring Program and Subsidies Extension)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 - PRIOR REFERENCE PERIODS FOR WAGE SUBSIDY, RENT SUBSIDY AND HIRING PROGRAM AND SUBSIDIES EXTENSION) in order to (1) allow eligible entities that were not carrying on their business or ordinary activities on March 1, 2019, and that chose to apply the general approach after Period 4, to elect to choose the alternative approach for Periods 14 to 17 (March to June 2021); (2) to extend the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy (CEWS), Canada Emergency Rent Subsidy (CERS) and Lockdown Support for an additional period, from September 26, 2021 to October 23, 2021; and (3) to increase the subsidy rates for the CEWS and CERS for the 20th qualifying period (August 29, 2021 to September 25, 2021).
